Important Notice

Fundraising Activities Suspended

Effective immediately, I am no longer organizing fundraising campaigns.

After months of supporting families in Gaza and other humanitarian causes, I've had to suspend all fundraising activities due to:

  • Administrative complexity: Managing funds through personal accounts created significant legal and tax compliance issues in Italy
  • Banking restrictions: Multiple account closures and compliance challenges made operations unsustainable
  • Personal circumstances: I need to focus on my primary work and personal matters

What This Means

  • All active campaigns are being closed
  • Funds already collected will be transferred to intended beneficiaries
  • No new campaigns will be launched through this platform
  • I will not be accepting donations or organizing future fundraisers

Transparency Note

All fundraising activities conducted through this site were done as a volunteer intermediary. I received zero compensation and all funds (minus platform fees) were transferred to beneficiaries. Tax and compliance documentation for 2025 activities will be properly filed with Italian authorities.

Thank you to everyone who trusted me with their donations and stories. I did my best within my capacity.
